review.reviewText: One night stay. Hotel provided what I needed for that stay.

review.title: Met our basic needs
review.reviewText: Rooms were comfortable, free breakfast and all day tea/coffee was a nice perk.  Carpets were old and dirty from the lobby and stairs to the rooms. Stained carpet in our room.  Location wasnt great, signs everywhere to park at your own risk and dont leave any personal belongings in the car. Made me uncomfortable at night.  Close to water, nice to walk in the morning. 5 minutes to downtown Burlingame which was a very cute little town, lots of restaurants and shopping.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Chris,

Thank You for your kind comments in regards to your most recent stay. We look forward to your next stay! Safe travels

review.title: Conveniently close to the airport.
review.reviewText:
Airport shuttle was a plus. Breakfast was nothing special, but at least it was complimentary. 

Best way to get to the city is Uber.

review.title: Nice clean & quiet hotel
review.reviewText: Easy check in and nice room. The staff were very good . Other than the worn carpets ,the hotel seems quite clean . I liked the quick shuttle service to the airport .

managementResponses.response:
Dear Harry,

Thank You for your lovely comments in regards to your most recent stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay! Thank You and safe travels.

review.title: Age is just a number
review.reviewText: This is an older facility that was undergoing some renovations. It was not bothersome. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location was great. SFO airplane landings visible in back. If you want to avoid parking in SF, take hotel shuttle to airport and jump on BART.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anonymous,

Thank You for your comments in regards to your most recent stay with us! We look forward to your next stay!

Thank You and safe travels.

review.title: Great parking,snacks and the pool was great
review.reviewText:
Good hotel behind one of our favorite restaurants,Max`s.
Refreshments in lobby at check in,good breakfast.
Elevators are too small,otherwise a good hotel for the price!

managementResponses.response:
Dear Chelsea,

Thank You for your feedback in regards to your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and do sincerely apologize for the experience you encountered. We will make sure our staff is informed to prevent this situation from occuring again. Thank You and safe travels.

review.title: Decent airport hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was a good place to stay if flying into SFO. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. The only problem we had was they put our room right next to a housekeeping room or the kitchens or something where hotel staff have to make a lot of noise at 5am in the morning. Because the walls are thin, it disturbed our sleep. I wish the hotel would have warned us of this while checking in.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Paul,

Thank You for your lovey comments in regards to your most recent stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay! Thanks again and safe travels.

review.title: Near SFO airport.
review.reviewText: Convenient for SFO airport. Finding HWY 101 from the hotel not easy.
review.negativeRemarks: Decoration is a bit too dark

managementResponses.response:
Dear Aries,

Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your feedback and lovely comments in regards to our staff! We look forward to your next stay with us! Than You and safe travels.

review.reviewText: The hotel staff at the front desk while checking in was very courteous and accommodating. We were even given a complimentary parking for our 3 nights of stay at the hotel. The housekeepers were very good in taking care of our rooms in our entire stay. There is also a free coffee at the lobby throughout the day. I would say that the best is their complimentary breakfast buffet which has a wide variety of choices. Ovearall, we had a very wonderful stay at the hotel and we would come back again.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sharon S,

Thank You for your lovely comments in regards to your most recent stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay! Thank You!

review.title: Worked out perfectly for an early morning flight.
review.reviewText: Very comfortable, clean and friendly. That's it, that's all I have to say.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anonymous,

Thank You for your  feedback in regards to your most recent stay with us. Our management team will make sure carpets are clean as well as looking into healthier breakfast options. We do still offer fruit during breakfast as well as fresh pastries and yogurt. Thank You again and safe travels.

review.reviewText: Parking cost is ridiculous.  Hall carpets were dirty. Need more healthy breakfast food options.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anonymous,

Thank You for your review! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay!

review.title: close to SF airport
review.reviewText: Hotel is close to the airport and has a convenient shuttle service to the airport.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anonymous,

Thank You for your lovely comments in regards to your recent stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you back! Safe Travels and Thank You!

review.title: close to race start
review.reviewText: The location was great. It was only 1 block from the start of the Diva run.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Genia,

Thanks for staying with us and for the 5 Star review. I appreciate the shout out to Taylor and the and the rest of our fabulous team. We're glad you enjoyed your Holiday Inn Express experience and look forward to seeing you again soon. Thanks again!

review.title: Very nice location. Close to airport. Beach front.
review.reviewText:
The service was excellent. Taylor the manger was awesome and each of the staff members were very personable. The cleaning crew was so friendly and welcoming. She and the staff helped us with travel information and map quest, so we could arrive at our locations with ease.

The breakfast was amazing. The selection was great with the eggs, sausage, bacon and ham every morning.
Fruit and yogart too. All the coffee and tea all day long was so nice and convenient. Fruit was available all day long and cookies in the afternoon. What a treat!!

We would recommend The Hotel to everyone traveling to San Francisco, CA.

It was a warm and friendly hotel.
review.positiveRemarks:
The personal touches and welcoming staff.
Close to the airport and a shuttle to and from also.
review.negativeRemarks: Did not find any issues there.
review.locationRemarks: The Trolley cars and Fisherman's Wharf were near by.

managementResponses.response:
Dear anneski,

 Thanks for staying with us and for taking the time to share such lovely comments about your Holiday Inn Express experience. We appreciate the kind words and hope to see you again soon!

review.reviewText: Good place for a 2 night stay. Close to downtown and freeways

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anonymous,

-Thanks for staying with us and for the 5 Star review. I'm so glad to hear that you had a great Holiday Inn Express experience. All of your very kind comments are most appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

review.title: Nice place, expensive due to timing
review.reviewText: Nice location right off the bay.  Room clean and remodeled.  Breakfast was quite nice for a 3 star.  Due to the dates, the price was quite crazy, a 5 star price per night at 3 star hotel.  But SF hotels were all expensive during the period of my stay.
review.locationRemarks: Great mall nearby for food and shopping

managementResponses.response:
Dear Tim,

 Thanks for staying with us and for taking the time to share such lovely comments about your Holiday Inn Express experience. We appreciate the kind words and hope to see you again soon!

review.title: Great free full breakfast!
review.reviewText: This place has a great full breakfast.  I have stayed there 2 times now and love the park and fly option so I can leave my car there. The restaurant in front of the hotel has great food and a piano bar.
review.negativeRemarks: room carpet had some stains in it

managementResponses.response:
Dear jim,

Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate that you find our location to be convenient. However, we’re sorry we fell below your expectation regarding the carpets in the room. We will address these concerns. Thank you for staying with us and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.

Sincerely,
Leila Borja
General Manager

review.title: Excellent breakfast
review.reviewText: Carpets in rooms are tired and old!oops should be allowed to keep a review short and to the point without having been told to add a bit more to thr review
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport and good shuttle

managementResponses.response:
Dear Devon,

 Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate that you find our location to be convenient and for your nice comment about our amenities we offered to our guest. Thank you for staying with us and we all hope to have an opportunity to serve you again on your next future visit.

Respectfully,
Leila Borja
General Manager

review.title: Very nice hotel
review.reviewText: Our stay was great. The location was perfect.The highway was right there
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel provided extras everyday that made our stay special, like fruit available in the lobby all day-everyday. Complimentary breakfast that includ
review.locationRemarks: The highway was right there for easy access, to take you anywhere.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Angie,

Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am pleased to note that you liked the room cleanliness and comfortable beds. We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide not just good value, but comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations. It is regrettable to hear that there were few let down during your stay particularly with the bay view room. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you. Hence, we are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and will recommend the hotel. Again, thank you for your valued feedback and we look forward to hosting you on your next visit.

Sincerely,
Leila Borja
General Manager

review.title: Close to airport and good hot breakfast
review.reviewText: Very easy to find from the airport.  Rooms were very nice - clean - beds comfortable.  Booked a bay view room and was disappointed the view was not all that great, so I would not pay the extra for the bay view. Breakfast was very good had a good selection.  Nice little town square area right over the freeway from the hotel, found a great place to eat Broadway Grill.  Would highly recommend it.
review.positiveRemarks: Ease of location and comfort of rooms.
